#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef vector<char> vc;
typedef vector<string> vs;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n%2==1) n--;
        n/=2;
        if(n%2==0) cout<<(n/2)*(n/2)<<endl;
        else
            cout<<(n/2)*((n/2)+1)<<endl;
    }
}
